did.unittitle: João José da Silva bond to George Gosman
did.abstract: Bond for 1,875 pounds, payable on 1 March 1799, from merchant João José da Silva of New York City to bricklayer George Gosman, also of New York City. Dated 1 March 1796. Signed by da Silva and by witnesses Peter Augustus Jay and Robert Gosman. For a consideration of ten shillings, José Joaquim da Costa co-signed the bond as co-obligor, and da Costa's obligation is also signed by witnesses Peter Augustus Jay and Robert Gosman.
